attributes.action: Help Beekeepers by removing VAT on all Bee Keeping Equipment
attributes.additional_details: Bees are in decline and without the support of beekeepers, the cost to humanity and the economy would be great.
attributes.background: The majority of Beekeepers are hobbyists and as such make very little if any money from what they do; the cost of equipment is expensive. Removing VAT would help tremendously in keeping costs down and make if more affordable to encourage more beekeepers.
